title: runtime: "fatal error: schedule: holding locks" during runtime.Stack()
body:
### info
0. What version of Go are you using (go version)?
  * go version go1.4 linux/amd64.
0. What operating system and processor architecture are you using?
  * Ubuntu 12.04LTS 64bit, Linux 3.8.0-41-generic, Core i7-4770.
0. What did you do?
  * Run the following test with GOMAXPROCS=4.
0. What did you expect to see?
  *  pass the test.
0. What did you see instead?
 *  "fatal error: schedule: holding locks" occurred.

### test code
```go
func TestRepro(t *testing.T) {
	var wg sync.WaitGroup
	wg.Add(2)
	test := func() {
		for i := 0; i < 100; i++ {
			buf := &bytes.Buffer{}
			pprof.Lookup("goroutine").WriteTo(buf, 2)
		}
		wg.Done()
	}

	go test()
	go test()
	wg.Wait()
}
```
